meanings.definition: The branch of electronics dealing with the design and manufacture of microcircuits.
meanings.sent1: Microelectronics involves creating tiny circuits for electronic devices.
meanings.sent2: The field of microelectronics has revolutionized the way we use technology.
meanings.sent3: I tried to build a robot with microelectronics, but it ended up being the size of a peanut!
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, microelectronics is like building a city on a grain of sand.
meanings.sent5: Learning about microelectronics is like discovering a hidden world of miniature wonders.

meanings.definition: The technology of very small electronic devices and components.
meanings.sent1: Microelectronics has led to the development of incredibly small gadgets.
meanings.sent2: Many modern devices rely on the advancements in microelectronics.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my microelectronics kit, and now I can't find the tiny components!
meanings.sent4: The impact of microelectronics on our lives is as profound as the tiniest details in a painting.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the world of microelectronics is like diving into a sea of miniature marvels.
